name: Detective in the Rough
description:
The Bope Diamond has just been stolen! The only people there at the time of it's disappearance were the security guards. As Detective Dick Diamond, you must get to the bottom of this gross theft. Interview perps to gain their knowledge, collect evidence, and get your man to return order to the Brand Museum!

Programmers: Brandon LaBrake, Jack Carlan

Designer: Patrick MacCarthy

All 3D Assets, Textures, and UI were made during the 56 hour period.

Email me! patmacc27@outlook.com
